org.apache.taverna.server.master.rest

Interface TavernaServerInputREST


  • @RolesAllowed(value="ROLE_tavernauser")
public interface TavernaServerInputREST
    This represents how a Taverna Server workflow run's inputs looks to a RESTful API.
    Author:
    Donal Fellows.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  TavernaServerInputREST.InDesc
      The Details of a particular input port's value assignment, done with JAXB.
      static class  TavernaServerInputREST.InputsDescriptor
      A description of the structure of inputs to a Taverna workflow run, done with JAXB.
      static interface  TavernaServerInputREST.PathNames 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response baclavaOptions()
      Get an outline of the operations supported.
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response expectedOptions()
      Get an outline of the operations supported.

      String getBaclavaFile() 
      InputDescription getExpected() 
      TavernaServerInputREST.InDesc getInput(String name, javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo)
      Get what input is set for the specific input.

      Get an outline of the operations supported.

      Get an outline of the operations supported.

      Set the Baclava file that will supply all the inputs to the workflow run.
      TavernaServerInputREST.InDesc setInput(String name, TavernaServerInputREST.InDesc inputDescriptor, javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo)
      Set what an input uses to provide data into the workflow run.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        @GET
 @Path(value="/")
 @Produces(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
 @Nonnull
TavernaServerInputREST.InputsDescriptor get()
        Returns:
        A description of the various URIs to inputs associated with a workflow run.

      • options

        @OPTIONS
 @Path(value="/")
javax.ws.rs.core.Response options()
        Get an outline of the operations supported.

      • getExpected

        @GET
 @Path(value="expected")
 @Produces(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
 @Nonnull
InputDescription getExpected()
        Returns:
        A description of the various URIs to inputs associated with a workflow run.

      • expectedOptions

        @OPTIONS
 @Path(value="expected")
javax.ws.rs.core.Response expectedOptions()
        Get an outline of the operations supported.

      • getBaclavaFile

        @GET
 @Path(value="baclava")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
 @Nonnull
String getBaclavaFile()
        Returns:
        The Baclava file that will supply all the inputs to the workflow run, or empty to indicate that no such file is specified.

      • setBaclavaFile

        @PUT
 @Path(value="baclava")
 @Consumes(value="text/plain")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
 @Nonnull
String setBaclavaFile(@Nonnull
                                                                                                                           String filename)
                                                                                                                    throws NoUpdateException,
                                                                                                                           BadStateChangeException,
                                                                                                                           FilesystemAccessException
        Set the Baclava file that will supply all the inputs to the workflow run.
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename to set.
        Returns:
        The name of the Baclava file that was actually set.
        Throws:
        NoUpdateException - If the user can't update the run.
        BadStateChangeException - If the run is not Initialized.
        FilesystemAccessException - If the filename starts with a / or if it contains a .. segment.

      • baclavaOptions

        @OPTIONS
 @Path(value="baclava")
javax.ws.rs.core.Response baclavaOptions()
        Get an outline of the operations supported.

      • getInput

        @GET
 @Path(value="input/{name}")
 @Produces(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
 @Nonnull
TavernaServerInputREST.InDesc getInput(@Nonnull @PathParam(value="name")
                                                                                                                                            String name,
                                                                                                                                            @Context
                                                                                                                                            javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo)
                                                                                                                                     throws BadInputPortNameException
        Get what input is set for the specific input.
        Parameters:
        name - The input to set.
        uriInfo - About the URI used to access this resource.
        Returns:
        A description of the input.
        Throws:
        BadInputPortNameException - If no input with that name exists.

      • setInput

        @PUT
 @Path(value="input/{name}")
 @Consumes(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
 @Produces(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
 @Nonnull
TavernaServerInputREST.InDesc setInput(@Nonnull @PathParam(value="name")
                                                                                                                                                                                                     String name,
                                                                                                                                                                                                     @Nonnull
                                                                                                                                                                                                     TavernaServerInputREST.InDesc inputDescriptor,
                                                                                                                                                                                                     @Context
                                                                                                                                                                                                     javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo)
                                                                                                                                                                                              throws NoUpdateException,
                                                                                                                                                                                                     BadStateChangeException,
                                                                                                                                                                                                     FilesystemAccessException,
                                                                                                                                                                                                     BadPropertyValueException,
                                                                                                                                                                                                     BadInputPortNameException
        Set what an input uses to provide data into the workflow run.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the input.
        inputDescriptor - A description of the input
        uriInfo - About the URI used to access this resource.
        Returns:
        A description of the input.
        Throws:
        NoUpdateException - If the user can't update the run.
        BadStateChangeException - If the run is not Initialized.
        FilesystemAccessException - If a filename is being set and the filename starts with a / or if it contains a .. segment.
        BadInputPortNameException - If no input with that name exists.
        BadPropertyValueException - If some bad misconfiguration has happened.

      • inputOptions

        @OPTIONS
 @Path(value="input/{name}")
javax.ws.rs.core.Response inputOptions(@PathParam(value="name")
                                                                             String name)
        Get an outline of the operations supported.
